product_name: INDIE LEEPurifying Face Wash with Antioxidants
summary: SummaryAntioxidant-rich Indie Lee Purifying Face Wash gently, yet thoroughly, removes makeup and impurities ensuring the skin feels soft and supple, never tight.
details: DetailsBenefitsNourishes skin while removing makeup and impuritiesDissolves excess sebum promoting a clearer, brighter complexionSkin feels soft and supple, never tightPrinted on FSC certified paperKey IngredientsOrange and Lavender Extracts nourish the skin while dissolving excess sebumClove, Burdock and Mandarin promote a clearer, brighter complexionRose Damascena and Jasmine ensure skin feels soft and suppleFormulated WithoutAlways formulated without 1,300+ banned ingredients, including: Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfate-based detergents, Synthetic Fragrance, Petroleum-based ingredients, Phthalates, Phenoxyethanol, Formaldehyde and GMO ingredientsItem 2563190How To UseApply to damp skin, gently massage and rinse.Precautions: For external use only. This product is packaged glass. Glass is fragile which may break if dropped.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Capryloyl/Caproyl Methyl Glucamide, Lauroyl/Myristoyl Methyl Glucamide, Coco Glucoside, Sucrose Cocoate, Glycerin, Spondias Mombin Pulp Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Pulp Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Fruit Extract, Rose Damascena Flower Extract, Vanilla Plantifolia Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Extract, Lavendula Angustifloia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Pulp Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Fruit Extract, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol (Natural), Phenethyl Alcohol (Natural) 98% Natural Origin Of Total.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to damp skin, gently massage and rinse.Precautions: For external use only. This product is packaged glass. Glass is fragile which may break if dropped.
ingredients: Phenethyl Alcohol (Natural) 98% Natural Origin Of Total

reviews.headline: Burnt my face
reviews.comments: I have dry/normal skin maybe a bit sensative, i tried this from a sample and it burnt my cheeks after applying it. I had to ice my face for the redness to go down. Now my skin feels scaly.

reviews.headline: Bought in promotion
reviews.comments: A few months ago I received a sample of this, really liked it. It's a bit pricey at full price so when I saw it on promotion, I snagged this it is a good product but I'm not sure if it is necessarily worth the full price. Will I buy it again? I'm not sure. There's an ELF face wash in a blue bottle that's just as good for a fraction of the price.

reviews.headline: Smells bad
reviews.comments: Got a sample of this and tried it. It was an ok face wash nothing special but the smell is terrible. There are better and cheaper products out there.

reviews.headline: Broke me out majorly
reviews.comments: Pretty sure this broke me out. I do have dry/normal skin. I have bumps all over my face from using this though…This has NEVER happened to me

reviews.headline: Way Too Strong for Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this in one of Ulta's sample bags. I really dislike this face wash. I used it twice and my skin is so dried out and incredibly uncomfortable. I have relatively sensitive skin, so if youre in the same boat i recommend avoiding this one. I also hate the smell of it, it smells like a doctors office.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments:
I absolutely love this cleanser, so much that I've repurchased 4 times now. It has a very subtle clean scent but it's definitely not over powering. It makes my skin feel so soft and clean after using without feeling stripped or dry. 

I also believe that this cleanser is what helped clear up my hormonal acne. After I ran out and repurchased a different cleanser my acne came back very soon after switching. But as soon as I go back to this specific cleanser it goes away almost immediately, my skin just loves it!

reviews.headline: Worst packing ever
reviews.comments: The product was okay for the two times I got to use it, it got knocked off the ledge of the tub by accident and shattered into a thousand pieces of clear glass and cut my foot. I'm still cleaning it up. Please change this packaging, it's a hazard.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this product!!!  I am concerned with blemishes and what i put on my skin and it has been a game changer

reviews.headline: GO BUY THIS RIGHT NOW
reviews.comments: Have had terrible hormonal acne for the past 5 years and nothing helps, UNTIL THIS FACE WASH. I've tried everything, Dermalogica, La Roche Posay, Origins, Murad, the list goes on. This is the first face wash where in the first 3 days, I can see my hormonal acne fading. Love this stuff I hope they never change the formula. It's perfect, the scent is subtle but clean, the packaging is so cute, the price is moderately expensive, but WORTH EVERY PENNY. Do your self a favor and give this face wash a try.

reviews.headline: Gentle? Yes!
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin, and the vast majority of cleansers—even cleansers that claim to be gentle—irritate my skin, making it feel tight or tingly or angry. I'm generally apprehensive to try new cleansers, but I received a packet of this in a gift with purchase and decided to give it a go. Hokey smokes—I was pleasantly surprised! My face felt clean and soft and happy. Also, a little goes a long way, which I appreciate. I would definitely purchase a full size.

reviews.headline: Wish it was better
reviews.comments: There's was so much potential in this product, i tried going back to this product but my face told me no, it caused me so much breakouts and I rarely ever get breakouts or acne, even when I was in high school but I'm pretty sure it works out well for other people

reviews.headline: The best skincare line for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: ￼my skin is extremely sensitive and my moisture Barrier is super fragile so my skin hates 90% of cleansers I also have eczema and a lot of skincare products give me dermatitis but not this brand!! I was using their brightening cleanser for years which I love but I have been dealing with hormonal breakouts so I wanted a deeper cleanse so I switched to this and my face has cleared up so much my skin is super dry and this did not dry it out which is great hydrated deep cleanse I've never had any bad experiences with this brand but their ingredients are super safe and non toxic

reviews.headline: it's okay
reviews.comments: purchased item on sale. product is okay, would not purchase again.

reviews.headline: Like Dermalogica special cleansing gel but better
reviews.comments: I am a w***e for the special cleansing gel from Dermalogica but think this is even better because it also takes off makeup! It's gentle enough to not strip my skin but does make a noticeable difference with my acne. As advertised, my skin feels refreshed but not super tight after cleansing. It doesn't get off the heavier makeup unless I use a couple pumps or combine it with something else, like my Well People plantfoliant. I have oily/combination skin that does not do well with a lot acne cleansers. My mom threw as many Neutrogena products as she could at me growing up and they never seemed to work. The first time I found something that I actually liked as a daily cleanser for acne was the Avene cleanace gel cleanser. So thank you Indie Lee for coming through with a great product for sensitive skinned acne-prone oily folks like me :)

reviews.headline: Amazing gentle cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I've been using this cleanser for about 8 months and I absolutely love it when compared to all the other cleansers I've tried. It's very gentle, not stripping, but makes my skin feel very nice and clean. Amazing product.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Have been using it for awhile, it has helped my acne and scarring a lot. My skin is glowing!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love this product and have shared with a friend. She has seen how it has made my skin look after only one week. She has ordered the cleanser and moisturizer..

reviews.headline: Not Good Enough on Acne
reviews.comments: I got this, because I wanted to elevate my skincare experience. The glass bottle feels nice and the cleanser has a pleasant smell to it. It leaves the skin feeling refreshed and smooth, but seemed to do nothing for my acne. I've gone through an entire bottle now, trying to give it a chance to start working on my skin. Now, I think my old Cerave cleanser did a better job at taming my occasional pimples, as well as keeping them at bay. Will not be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: ok cleanser, terrible smell
reviews.comments: I'm shocked not many have mentioned the smell of this cleanser. it's awful, I've never smelled anything like it. I'm all for scent free products but they have to not be so terrible that it actually makes me sick to my stomach. I'm debating whether it's worth a trip to ulta to return it or not. definitely won't buy again

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Feels good going on.  You only use a small amount so bottle lasts a long time
